meanings.sent1: The bee's legs were pollened after visiting the flowers.
meanings.sent2: The car was pollened with yellow dust from the nearby trees.
meanings.sent3: The pollened butterfly looked like it had been rolling in yellow paint.
meanings.sent4: The garden was pollened with colorful specks, creating a vibrant scene.
meanings.sent5: The pollened flowers attracted many bees with their sweet scent.

meanings.sent1: The pollened seeds grew into healthy plants in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The pollened fruit trees bore delicious fruits in the summer.
meanings.sent3: The pollened soil seemed to magically transform into a fertile paradise.
meanings.sent4: The pollened fields yielded a bountiful harvest for the farmers.
meanings.sent5: The pollened crops swayed gently in the breeze, promising a good yield.

meanings.sent1: The pollened flowers released a cloud of yellow dust when touched.
meanings.sent2: The pollened catkins scattered pollen everywhere in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The pollened trees seemed to be sneezing with all the pollen they had.
meanings.sent4: The pollened plants shimmered in the sunlight, showcasing their pollen.
meanings.sent5: The pollened air was thick with the sweet scent of flowers.
